aboutme.description: I'm a passionate full stack web developer and computer science student at Langara college. I want to become a full stack web developer

qualities.heading: Fast
qualities.description: Fast load times and lag free interaction, my highest priority.

qualities.heading: Responsive
qualities.description: My layouts will work on any device, big or small.

qualities.heading: Intuitive
qualities.description: Strong preference for easy to use, intuitive UX/UI.

qualities.heading: Dynamic
qualities.description: Websites don't have to be static, I love making pages come to life.
